entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:06 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -23.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 1:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -23.3°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.6°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
